bLogBinding: Should log when a binding is executed.

methods.name: AreBindingsInitialized
methods.doc: The bindings were initialized, manually or automatically.

methods.name: AreEventsInitialized
methods.doc: The events were initialized, manually or automatically.

methods.name: AreSourcesInitialized
methods.doc: The sources were initialized, manually or automatically.

methods.name: InitializeBindings
methods.doc:
Initialize the bindings if they are not already initialized.
Initializing the bindings will execute them.

methods.name: InitializeEvents
methods.doc: Initialize the events if they are not already initialized.

methods.name: InitializeSources
UninitializeBindings
methods.doc: Uninitialize the bindings if they are already initialized.

methods.name: UninitializeEvents
methods.doc: Uninitialize the events if they are already initialized.

methods.name: UninitializeSources
methods.doc:
Uninitialize the sources if they are already initialized.
It will uninitialized the bindings.
